original_title: 縄と男たち５　傷だらけの懺悔録
overview: Atsushi is a boy who is autistic and has cut his wrist many times. His lover, Masaaki, wants to save him somehow. This shocking work depicts their love escapade in the SM genre in a radical and head-on manner. This is the fifth installment in the hit series that depicts the clumsy, innocent love of two people living hard in modern society.
title: Rope and Boys 5: Wounded Confessions
